review:
*** ***** ******** ** *** ** *** **** *** * **** **** She has done My Laprascopy  Total hysterectomy surgery recently. I was amazed by pain less & super fast recovery. I very much appreciate her surgery skills, care & guidance provided post surgery as well. 
Her personal touch & willingness to spend time with her patients is a welcome trait for those she is treating. She always go above & beyond & work tirelessly towards a healthy outcome. She is very efficient , organised 
 
I feel so blessed to know her & have her as my Dr. 

Thank you Dr. Mansi 
Regards
Trupti

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
The personal attention and kindness shown by Dr. Manasi helped me overcome my fears about surgery.The counseling I received from her before undergoing the surgery was crucial in my speedy recovery.Before saying that she is an extraordinary doctor, I want to tell that she is an extraordinary human being.Patients can't thank her ever enough for the way she understands, explains issues and treats with care, handles complications with ease. Thanks for lending your hand and helping me overcome all obstacles and finally become a Mother.
No words will ever be enough to thank you.I have never seen such a wonderful doctor in my entire life.I would like to add that the way she handles patients is very calming and soothing.Extremely down to earth******* ******* *** loving touch makes her the perfect doctor.
Thank you so much for giving me my bundle of joy.

Mahasweta Bhuyan

I have had the most satisfying experience with Dr Mansi. The appointment process was very well and politely handled and each and every appointment was as per my convenience and absolutely on time. Dr Mansi is a thorough professional and extremely patient. She takes extra effort to explain things in detail which is very satisfying and relaxing. Extremely approachable and ever helpful, she has been a huge support during the several complications  I faced during my pregnancy. Our baby was delivered by her fit and healthy. I am extremely satisfied with the overall experience. Her smiling and jovial nature is extremely calming. I would like to highly recommend Dr Mansi to all needing gynecological advice.

Dr. Mansi Madhukar is the most gentle Doctor i have met. I have most satisfying experience with her. The personal attention and kindness shown by Dr. Mansi helped me overcome my fears about surgery. 
My Laparoscopy Hysterectomy surgery recently. I was amazed by pain less & super fast recovery. I feel so blessed to know her & have her as my Dr. 

Thank you,  Dr. Mansi Madhukar
Regards,
Mrs. Smita uday Shinde.

review:
She's the most gentle doctor I have met. Will explain you everything. Her aura and voice and care just soothes all your nerves. 

Had my fibroids removed by her. She did it with the least scarring and least pain.

 She had new ways pre and post surgery too to help recuperate faster. Can't thank her enough. Will definitely recommend her to all.

1. Very patient
2. Very approachable
3. Will explain you the treatment in detail.
4. Very particular and sistamatic in her way of working.
5. Clinic kept clean and pleasent.

I saw Dr Mansi Medhekar for my pregnancy and would strongly recommend her. Her kind and down-to-earth persona puts you at ease. She is extremely approchable and her in depth knowledge and expertise is apparent in the way she answers questions and explains everything in detail. She always had a gentle and calm approach to any issues arising during pregnancy and her advice always brought great results !
It was my first appointment with her yesterday. She was extremely polite and empathetic towards the agony i was going through.  I would highly recommend her !
